Cards.Content: devChance: Your product manager informed your team that a rivalry development team is working on new groundbreaking feature. The team need to re-prioritize product backlog.
pmChance: A Developer on your team got too lit last night, she called off today.
pmChance: Your Client wants to add a new feature

Cards.Description: Remove one card from the back log
